meanings.definition: A plant of the mint family with aromatic leaves.
meanings.sent1: The horsemint in the garden smelled so nice.
meanings.sent2: I picked some horsemint to use in my tea.
meanings.sent3: The horsemint and the lavender had a scented competition.
meanings.sent4: The horsemint stood out among the other herbs like a fragrant star.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the horsemint filled the air with freshness.

meanings.definition: A plant used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: The herbalist recommended horsemint for my cold.
meanings.sent2: Horsemint has been used for centuries in traditional medicine.
meanings.sent3: I brewed a potion with horsemint and other magical herbs.
meanings.sent4: The healing power of horsemint was like nature's own medicine.
meanings.sent5: The horsemint leaves were gathered for their medicinal properties.

meanings.definition: A plant that attracts bees and butterflies.
meanings.sent1: The horsemint in the field was buzzing with bees.
meanings.sent2: Butterflies fluttered around the colorful horsemint flowers.
meanings.sent3: The bees had a party on the horsemint blooms.
meanings.sent4: The horsemint was a busy airport for the insects.
meanings.sent5: The garden was alive with the hum of bees drawn to the horsemint.
